entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening and before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 March 2023
